mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.parent_id, p.permission_code, p.permission_name, p.permission_type, p.path, p.icon, p.sort_order, p.status, p.create_time, p.update_time, p.deleted FROM permission p INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND p.deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort_order

SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.parent_id, p.permission_code, p.permission_name, p.permission_type, p.path, p.icon, p.sort_order, p.status, p.create_time, p.update_time, p.deleted FROM permission p INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort_order

SELECT id, parent_id, permission_code, permission_name, permission_type, path, icon, sort_order, status, create_time, update_time, deleted FROM permission WHERE permission_code = #{permissionCode} AND deleted = 0
SELECT id, parent_id, permission_code, permission_name, permission_type, path, icon, sort_order, status, create_time, update_time, deleted FROM permission WHERE deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM permission WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND deleted = 0
